name: Demon Sigil
description:
## The demons come to feast upon all in this realm, and you're the last bastion of hope in stopping them.

## How To Play

 - WASD + Mouse for aiming.

 - Left mouse click or spacebar to fire primary attack.

 - Right mouse click or control to fire secondary attack.

 - Prevent the skeletons from activating the sigils to summon their demon lord sooner.

 - Kill the demon or die trying.
